All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BasePanel
 
Board
 
BoardBox
Class representing the cell of the Board.
BoardBoxPanel
 
BoardBoxView
Class representing an immutable cell on the board.
BoardBoxViewAdapter
The BoardBoxViewAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter used for serializing and deserializing BoardBoxView objects.
Bookshelf
The Bookshelf class represents a player's bookshelf in the game.
BookshelfPanel
 
Check
The Check class provides a set of static methods used by the client application for various checks and validations.
ChoicePanel
 
CLI
 
Client
Abstract class that creates a new client
ClientHandler
Class that creates a new client handler that handles the messages received from the server
ClientInterface
The ClientInterface interface defines the methods that a client implementation should provide for interacting with the game.
ClientMain
Main class of the client that starts the client application and asks the user if he wants to play with CLI or GUI.
ClientPinger
Class that pings the client to check if the connection is still alive
ClientRMI
Class that creates a new client RMI
ClientSocket
Class that creates a new client socket
ClientView
The ClientView class represents the client's view of the game.
Colors
 
Commands
Interface representing a command.
CommandsLobby
Enumeration of lobby commands.
CommandsTurn
Enumeration of turn commands.
CommonGoalCard
CommonGoalCard is the abstract class that will be extended by the 12 different types of CommonGoalCard
CommonGoalCard1
 
CommonGoalCard10
 
CommonGoalCard11
 
CommonGoalCard12
 
CommonGoalCard2
 
CommonGoalCard3
 
CommonGoalCard4
 
CommonGoalCard5
 
CommonGoalCard6
 
CommonGoalCard7
 
CommonGoalCard8
 
CommonGoalCard9
 
Connection
Abstract class that creates a new connection between server and client (server side)
ConnectionHandler
The ConnectionHandler class extends the MessageHandler class and handles incoming messages related to connection events.
Data
Enum that represents the key of the payload for information inputs from the client during the game
DisconnectionPanel
 
EndTurnListener
The EndTurnListener class is an event listener that listens to the game controller.
EndTurnPanel
 
ErrorHandler
The ErrorHandler class extends the MessageHandler class and handles incoming error messages.
ErrorListener
The ErrorListener class is an event listener that listens to the game controller and handles error events.
ErrorType
Enum that represents the type of the error message sent between client and server and the String to print when the error occurs
EventListener
The EventListener class is an abstract class that serves as a base for implementing event listeners.
FinalRankingPanel
 
Game
The Game class represents a game instance.
GameController
The GameController class handles the logic and flow of the game.
GameLobby
Class GameLobby is the class that represents the game lobby of a single game.
GameLobbyInfo
This class is used to store the current state of a gameLobby.
GameLobbyInfoAdapter
 
GameRules
The GameRules class represents the game rules and provides access to various game-related settings and configurations.
GlobalLobby
Class that represents the Global Lobby of the server that contains all the games in progress or waiting to be created and the players that have just successfully connected (with unique username) and have not yet decided what to do.
GUIApplication
 
InfoAndEndGameListener
The InfoAndEndGameListener class is responsible for sending necessary game data and handling end game events.
ItemTile
Class that represents the single tile of the game
ItemTileView
Serializable immutable class represents the single tile.
ItemTileViewAdapter
The ItemTileViewAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter used for serializing and deserializing ItemTileView objects.
KeyAbstractPayload
Interface that represents the key of the payload for information about the message
KeyConnectionPayload
Enum that represents the key of the payload for information about the connection
KeyErrorPayload
Enum that represents the key of the payload for information the main group of the error messages
KeyLobbyPayload
Enum that represents the key of the payload for information about the lobby
ListenerManager
The ListenerManager class manages event listeners for different events in the game.
LobbyDecisionPanel
 
LobbyHandler
The LobbyHandler class extends the MessageHandler class and handles incoming messages related to lobby decisions.
LobbyPanel
 
ManagerHandlers
The ManagerHandlers class manages the mapping between message types and their corresponding message handlers.
Message
Class that represents a message sent between client and server
MessageAdapter
 
MessageHandler
The MessageHandler class is an abstract class that provides a base implementation for handling messages received from the server.
MessageHeader
Class that represents the header of a message sent between client and server
MessageHeaderAdapter
 
MessagePayload
Class that represents the payload of a message sent between client and server
MessagePayloadAdapter
 
MessageToserverHandlerTurn
The MessageToServerHandler class handles sending messages to the server.
MessageType
Enum that represents the type of the message sent between client and server
ModelView
The ModelView class represents a set of immutable objects that are sent to the client.
ModelViewAdapter
 
PersonalGoalBox
Class that represents the single cell of the PersonalGoalCard having type belonging to the enum Type.
PersonalGoalCard
Class represents the player's personalGoal (immutable)
PersonalGoalCardAdapter
 
PhaseListener
The PhaseListener class is responsible for listening to the game controller and sending the current phase of the game to the turn player.
PingHandler
Class that handles the ping of the client to check if the connection is still alive or not, it extends TimerTask to be used as a timer task when the client is pinged by the server and the client does not respond in time the connection is closed and the client is disconnected from the server side and the thread is interrupted
Player
Player: Class that contains all the information related to the player during the game.
PlayerPointsView
Immutable class that represents the single player with his scores
PlayerPointsViewAdapter
 
PrinterBoard
The `PrinterBoard` class provides methods for printing board-related information.
PrinterBookshelfAndPersonal
The `PrinterBookshelfAndPersonal` class provides methods for printing bookshelf and personalGoal.
PrinterCommonGoalAndPoints
This class contains a method used to print each common goal card with its description and topmost token, as well as the methods to visualize the points of each player and the final ranking.
PrinterLogo
Class that prints the logos or drawings of the game in the CLI version of the game (ASCII art) using ANSI escape codes to color the output text in the terminal (only for Linux and MacOS) and the Unicode characters to print the drawings in the terminal
RMIClientConnection
The remote interface of the client RMI sent to the server to communicate with the client.
RMIConnection
RMI connection class that creates a new RMI connection between server and client (server side)
RMIHandler
RMI handler interface that is sent to the client to communicate with the server
RMIHandlerImplementation
RMI handler implementation that creates a new RMI connection between server and client (server side)
RMIServer
RMI server that creates a new RMI connection between server and client (server side)
SaveGame
This class is used to save the game state to disk, so that execution can resume where it left off even after the server crashes.
Server
Server class that handles the connection with the clients.
SocketConnection
Socket connection between server and client (server side)
SocketServer
Socket server that creates a new socket connection between server and client (server side) that extends Thread so that it can run in parallel with the other threads
Start
The Start class is the entry point of the program.
StartAndEndGameHandler
The StartAndEndGameHandler class extends the MessageHandler class and handles incoming messages related to the start and end of the game.
TurnHandler
The TurnHandler class extends the MessageHandler class and handles incoming messages related to the game turns.
TurnPhase
Enum class:contains all possible states of a game;
Type
Enum representing the types of the tiles.
